original_title: 病院で死ぬということ
overview: Filmed in a documentary style, six patients in six wards of different ages and circumstances await death at a hospital in Japan. The sterile and dismal environment is contrasted against the emotional being of the patients, their visitors and relatives and the outside world, which they will never again survey.
tagline: For patients, nurses, doctors and all other people.
title: Dying at a Hospital
